attributes.name: Adobe Credit
details: A $250 statement credit per calendar year after you spend $600 or more on U.S. purchases directly with Adobe in a calendar year. Enrollment required.â€¡
attributes.conditions: Must enroll for benefit and spend minimum $600 on Adobe products/services in calendar year to earn the $250 credit. Must purchase directly from Adobe. Covers Creative Cloud, Document Cloud, and other Adobe services.
